article_title: Bank of America to Pay $650 Million to AIG in Mortgage Disputes
article_text:
Bank of America Corp. will pay $650 million to American International Group Inc. to resolve allegations of fraud in the bank's packaging and selling of mortgages to investors during the housing bubble, settling some of the highest-profile litigation from the financial crisis.

AIG, which received one of the largest government bailouts during the crisis that has since been repaid, had originally demanded $10 billion when it sued in...
